title: Effect of USD v GBP depreciation

content.question: If the exchange rate between the United States dollar ($) and the British pound (£) changed from $2 per £1 to $3 per £1, and domestic prices in both countries stayed the same, then the United States dollar would

choices.label: depreciate, making United States imports from Britain more expensive
depreciate, making United States imports from Britain cheaper
appreciate, making United States imports from Britain more expensive
appreciate, making United States imports from Britain cheaper
purchase 3 times more British goods than before the change occurred

content.answer: depreciate, making United States imports from Britain more expensive

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
